Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/State
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, State, 59th, Lafayette and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via  63rd, State, 59th, Lafayette and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/State.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
